article_node.title: Stephen Miran Faces Senate Hearing
article_node.summary: Bloomberg’s "Balance of Power" highlighted a Senate hearing on Stephen Miran’s Fed nomination, with Senator Elizabeth Warren urging oversight of the President’s attacks on the Federal Reserve. Representative Byron Donalds supported releasing Jeffrey Epstein files and discussed congressional provisions. Energy Secretary Chris Wright detailed Trump administration moves affecting the energy sector, including offshore wind and LNG policies.
